td.content: s:patient presents w/ c/o 10 days h/o Heart. he is a 62 yr old white M tax collector. he denies smoking he reports having no more than one drink a day o:Height 65 in, Weight 145 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16 a:Mitral Valve Prolapse p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed hydralazine - 10 mg 3 x day, and ordered Chest X-Ray, ECG.

td.content: s:patient presents with 8 days history of worsening Heart. pt is a male aged 63 years. he drinks alcohol occasionally he denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 65 in, Weight 143 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15 a:Mitral Valve Prolapse p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed hydralazine - 10 mg 3 x day, and ordered Chest X-Ray, ECG.
